glosses: Mongolian (of or relating to Mongolia or its peoples, languages, or cultures)

Turkish people; used as an insult by left-wing nationalist Kurds who think that there is no difference, or do so to deny Turkic identity of Turkish people in disputes. Compare English Mongol used by Greeks and Armenians.

examples.text: — Sen Türk değil, Moğolsun! — İstersen kafatasımın ölçüsünü de al amına kodumun ırkçısı!
examples.translation: —You are a Mongol, not a Turk! —Go ahead and measure my skull, you fucking racist!
